name: Raiders of the Lost Cat
description:
Raiders of the Lost Cat is an adventure co-op game for 2 players. One of you will try to reach the final chamber where the Golden Space Cat Idol lies, but that won't be possible without the help of the other player, who will guide the Raider making use of the Diary of the Lost Cat. (DIARY INCLUDED AS A PDF).

The player who has the Diary of the Lost Cat should't be able to see the screen at any time!

You'll "never" run the same dungeon twice! There are 4 chambers/puzzles, with more than 6 randomly generated versions for each one (with some special secrets), which leads to more than 100 combinations.
